keyFacts: Multiple payments were made from JEGE, LLC to various payees including World Fuel Services, Inc. and the Port Authority of NY & NJ.
Payments to William Hammond total over $16,000 across several transactions.
The document includes various invoices and payment memos detailing the nature of services rendered.
The transactions span several months in 2015, indicating ongoing business relationships.
Several payments were made for pilot services, indicating aviation-related operations.
